ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dex/Agi/Where to go...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been whooping MUCHO posterior end at the clear area just south of the giant s camp in FV (along the wall).  I go out a ways, pull me a froggie (most are
ygData.messageBody:
I've been whooping MUCHO posterior end at the clear area just south of the
giant's camp in FV (along the wall). I go out a ways, pull me a froggie
(most are still blue at 37) or a Drolvarg (I can take all but the Snarlers),
and the exp just rolls on in ;o) One o these days I need to get me a Yak or
two... my Staff of Writhing and Kisch (*sighs*... I love my Kisch) are
nifty, but they really suck the stamina outta me in longer fights :o/

I like the BP neckalce for the neck area, personally :o)

-=B=-
37th (38th if I can mange to get any playtime in tonight)
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Cyr, Thierry <thierry.cyr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 9:15 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Dex/Agi/Where to go...


> Ok i hate asking questions like this, but i wasted so much time last night
> to get 1 bubble of xp it drove me nuts. I finally hit level 37 after
getting
> trained constantly last night in sol b and before that being grouped with
a
> too high level group for me that got me sloooooooow xp.
>
> Any suggestions other then Cazic Thule sewers for where i can hunt at 37
in
> a small group (2 to 5 people)
>
> Now here's my other question, What do most of ya go for? i havent been
> active on my bard for about 6 months, and his equipment has been revamped
> since then since i had sold most of his stuff to equip my necro, but now
the
> necro equipped him.
>
> Im currently in some:
> lambent armor
> crested helm
> Borrowed mith bp (psst Halana, we gotta hook up!)
> 2 yaks
>
> My equipment is not complete yet, but getting there
>
> Now here's what im getting at, I know we're fragile tanks, my yaks are
> finally procing, this will taunt mobs alot im assuming since im usually
> singing my heart away to buff us up. I dont wanna be hit.
>
> My question to you....
> Any suggestions to what i could use to raise my agi to not be hit? and
also
> my dex to raise my dex up to proc those swords as much as possible
>
> my current stats are about 100 strenght, 122 agility, 118 or so dex, and
> about 125 charisma
>
> what i'd like to know is what the non imbrued high lev bards are using and
> what they recommend
>
> -Minkin, lev 37
> Sol Ro
>
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
>
